item.title: [please] How do i make a safe spot? [please]
item.dc:creator: @JoeProDucktiions JoeProDucktiions
item.description:
@JoeProDucktiions wrote:

hey guyes i cant figure it out its a 317 source here a code i tryed to edit and couldnt figure it how this is what it was:
}
public boolean IsInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) {
if (Type == 1) {
if (coordY >= 3520 && coordY <= 3967 && coordX <= 3392
&& coordX >= 2942) {
return true;
}
} else if (Type == 2) {
if (coordY >= 3264 && coordY <= 3267 && coordX <= 2621
&& coordX >= 2615) {
return true;
}

this is what i did when i tryed to add safe spot i coped and pasted and replaces the xxxx and yyyy cords:

if (coordY >= 3264 && coordY <= 3267 && coordX <= 2615
&& coordX >= 2624) {
